page.title: 15Improvements for G. Shelford
page.content:
Twenty people from Great Shelford were asked what they did for a job or where they worked and other questions about their village and what their hobbies were. Most people in Great Shelford said that they were satisfied with their village though a few points were brought up :-
i) A public car park ii) A bus shelter iii) More Zebra crossings iv) Dogs should not foul the pavement v) The pavements were not level
Most people seemed happy with the facilities in their town for hobbies such as singing and darts.
